EmailTemplate.name: Email Inquiries
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for contact us
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.SuppliedName},
Thank you for submitting your question to us online. Case #{!Case.CaseNumber}: "{!Case.Subject}" has been created and a {!Organization.Name} Customer Advocate will get back to you within the next 24 hours.
Thank you,
Customer Advocate Team {!Organization.Name}
